---
title: "How to go to Barcelonnette, France"
format: html
---

More informations available here:  <https://seolane.org/>

The adress of Seolane center is : 

Pôle d'accueil universitaire Séolane 

Quartier du 11è BCA

Chemin des Casernes

04400 Barcelonnette

**By Train** 
you can take a train to Gap (Paris-Gap by night for example or Marseille-Gap). Then, you take the bus 535 (Gap-Barcelonette) wich leaves you 15 minutes' walk from the Séolane center.

**By Bus from Marseille**
Depending on your schedule, you can take: 

- the 69 bus, then the 535 bus, then 15 minutes' walk. 

- the 68 bus which is direct


**By car**
you can book a car in Gap or in Marseille.
